attributes.action: Be able to vote against these Petitions as well as for them ..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Modify this petition system to allow votes against proposed resolutions as well as votes for the resolution ..

As it exists it is not possible to gauge feeling against a resolution, only those for such ..

rejection.details:
This issue has been dealt with in the FAQs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
